name: California Plum Caprese Salad
author: Anonymous
summary: For this colorful and simple dish, succulent black and green California plums are sliced and arranged on a platter with fresh mozzarella and finished with a sweet and tangy pomegranate drizzle. Serve as a salad or as an appetizer with grilled baguette slices.
ingredients: 2 fruit (2-1/8" dia)s black California plums, pitted and thinly sliced
1  green California plum, pitted and thinly sliced
1 (8 ounce) ball fresh mozzarella, thinly sliced
directions: Place pomegranate juice in a saucepan and simmer over medium heat for about 10 minutes until reduced to 2 tablespoons
Stir in vinegar and sugar; cover and chill until ready to use
To prepare salad, arrange plum slices alternately with mozzarella on a platter
Drizzle with chilled pomegranate mixture and olive oil; sprinkle with basil and lemon zest
Serve as a salad or as an appetizer with grilled baguette slices
